unnormalised: Electoral reforms are vital for a robust democracy like ours. Strengthening the Election Commission of India (ECI) is key. Think about linking Aadhaar to voter IDs to curb fraud. Campaign finance transparency, perhaps through a national election fund, is crucial. Just like enjoying a good plate of biryani during Eid, fairness is paramount. We need reforms to ensure that every vote in Bharat truly counts, reflecting the will of the people, from Kashmir to Kanyakumari.
